Sentencas: In the research of new cathode materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells, the cobaltite Ba2Co9O14 shows attractive properties.
Titulo: Potentiality of Ba2Co9O14 as cathode material for IT-SOFC on various electrolytes

Sentencas: Its good electronic conductivity (sigma = 100-240 S.cm(-1) between 450 to 650 degrees C) as well as a reversible partial reducibility without structural modification, evidenced above 400 C, in favor of a possible O2- mobility, suggests a possible mixed conductivity.
Titulo: Potentiality of Ba2Co9O14 as cathode material for IT-SOFC on various electrolytes

Sentencas: These properties make it a potential material for SOFC cathode application.

Sentencas: A good chemical compatibility between Ba2Co9O14 and the classical electrolytes YSZ and CGO is evidenced.

Sentencas: However, the cathode adhesion on both electrolytes is problematic due to its greater thermal expansion.

Sentencas: Various composites [Ba2Co9O14-electrolyte] cathodes have been considered to improve the adhesion.
